languages.text: "Души предателей станут твоим даром Ему". {n}Острый клинок скользит по губам Кибеллы, и от одного его вида пленники сотрясаются нервной дрожью.{/n} "Твое право — приказать свершить казнь и смертью неверных связать нас через Него. Ибо Бог-Император, Неумирающий Император, и есть смерть. Ибо Неумирающий и есть долг".

"So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."
languages.original_text: "Души предателей станут твоим даром Ему". {n}Острый клинок скользит по губам Кибеллы, и от одного его вида пленники сотрясаются нервной дрожью.{/n} "Твое право — приказать свершить казнь и смертью неверных связать нас через Него. Ибо Бог-Император, Неумирающий Император, и есть смерть. Ибо Неумирающий и есть долг".

traits.locale_text: "The souls of the traitors will be your gift to Him." {n}Kibellah runs a sharp blade across her lips. The mere sight of the weapon causes the captives to shudder nervously.{/n} "It is your right to order the execution so that the death of these infidels binds us together through Him. For the Undying One is death itself. For the Undying One is duty itself."

"The souls of the traitors will be your gift to Him." {n}Kibellah runs a sharp blade across her lips. The mere sight of the weapon causes the captives to shudder nervously.{/n} "It is your right to order the execution so that the death of these infidels binds us together through Him. For the Undying One is death itself. For the Undying One is duty itself."

"So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the Undying One is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the Undying One is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

"So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

languages.text: « Pour que vous puissiez Lui offrir les âmes des traîtres. » {n}Kibellah effleure respectueusement des lèvres sa lame aiguisée, dont la simple vue semble emplir les prisonniers de terreur.{/n} « Vous pouvez ordonner leur exécution. Leur sang nous liera les uns aux autres à travers Lui. Car l'Empereur-Dieu, l'Immortel, est la mort elle-même. L'Immortel est le devoir incarné. »
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

traits.locale_text: « Pour que vous puissiez Lui offrir les âmes des traîtres. » {n}Kibellah effleure respectueusement des lèvres sa lame aiguisée, dont la simple vue semble emplir les prisonniers de terreur.{/n} « Vous pouvez ordonner leur exécution. Leur sang nous liera les uns aux autres à travers Lui. Car l'Empereur-Dieu, l'Immortel, est la mort elle-même. L'Immortel est le devoir incarné. »

languages.text: «Para que pueda ofrecer las almas de estos traidores como regalo para Él». {n}Kibellah se lleva con devoción su hoja afilada a los labios. Los prisioneros tiemblan de miedo al ver el arma.{/n} «Dispone de la autoridad para ordenar su ejecución. Su sangre nos unirá a través de Él, pues el Dios Emperador, el Inmortal, es la muerte en persona. El Inmortal es el deber en persona».
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

traits.locale_text: «Para que pueda ofrecer las almas de estos traidores como regalo para Él». {n}Kibellah se lleva con devoción su hoja afilada a los labios. Los prisioneros tiemblan de miedo al ver el arma.{/n} «Dispone de la autoridad para ordenar su ejecución. Su sangre nos unirá a través de Él, pues el Dios Emperador, el Inmortal, es la muerte en persona. El Inmortal es el deber en persona».

languages.text: “这样你就可以把这些叛徒的灵魂作为礼物，献给祂。”{n}绮贝菈恭恭敬敬地把锋利的刀刃贴在她的唇边。那些俘虏看到她的利刃，吓得浑身发抖。{/n}“你有权下令处决他们，他们的鲜血会通过不死之神将我们联结在一起，因为不死神皇就是死亡的化身，也是责任的化身。”
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

traits.locale_text: “这样你就可以把这些叛徒的灵魂作为礼物，献给祂。”{n}绮贝菈恭恭敬敬地把锋利的刀刃贴在她的唇边。那些俘虏看到她的利刃，吓得浑身发抖。{/n}“你有权下令处决他们，他们的鲜血会通过不死之神将我们联结在一起，因为不死神皇就是死亡的化身，也是责任的化身。”

languages.text: 「主への贈り物として、裏切者の魂を授けることができます」{n}キベラが尖った刀を唇で触れると、捕虜たちは恐怖に震えた。{/n}「あなたには処刑を命じる権限がある。彼らの血は、彼を通して私たちを結びつけるだろう。神帝陛下にとって不死の者は死そのものである。不滅の者は義務そのものである」
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

traits.locale_text: 「主への贈り物として、裏切者の魂を授けることができます」{n}キベラが尖った刀を唇で触れると、捕虜たちは恐怖に震えた。{/n}「あなたには処刑を命じる権限がある。彼らの血は、彼を通して私たちを結びつけるだろう。神帝陛下にとって不死の者は死そのものである。不滅の者は義務そのものである」

languages.text: "Ihr könnt ihm die Seelen dieser Verräter also als Geschenk darbieten." {n}Kibellah legt ihre scharfe Klinge ehrfürchtig an ihre Lippen. Die Gefangenen zittern vor Furcht, als sie die Waffe erblicken.{/n} "Ihr habt die Autorität, ihre Hinrichtung anzuordnen. Ihr Blut wird uns durch ihn zusammenbinden. Denn der Gottimperator, der Todlose ist der Tod selbst. Der Todlose ist die Pflicht selbst."
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt ihm die Seelen dieser Verräter also als Geschenk darbieten." {n}Kibellah legt ihre scharfe Klinge ehrfürchtig an ihre Lippen. Die Gefangenen zittern vor Furcht, als sie die Waffe erblicken.{/n} "Ihr habt die Autorität, ihre Hinrichtung anzuordnen. Ihr Blut wird uns durch ihn zusammenbinden. Denn der Gottimperator, der Todlose ist der Tod selbst. Der Todlose ist die Pflicht selbst."

The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."

languages.text: "Bu hainlerin ruhlarını O'na armağan edebilelim diye." {n}Kibellah, keskin bıçağını hürmetle dudaklarına değdiriyor. Silahı gören tutsaklar, korku içinde titriyor.{/n} "Onların infaz edilmesini emretmeye yetkin var. O'nun sayesinde dökülen kanlarıyla hepimiz bir olacağız. Ölmeyen Tanrı İmparator, ölümün ta kendisidir. Ölmeyen, vazifenin ta kendisidir."
languages.original_text: "So you may offer the souls of these traitors as a gift to Him." {n}Kibellah touches her sharp blade reverently to her lips. The captives tremble in fear at the sight of the weapon.{/n} "You have the authority to order their execution. Their blood will bind us together through Him. For the God-Emperor, the Undying One, is death itself. The Undying One is duty itself."
